reviews.review_msg: Prof has poor teaching skills but he's a nice guy. Don't take this course if your background ain't biomedical or lack understanding of Machine learning algorithms. Prof knowledge is not so good in ML side and good in biomed side. Seminar based course. I wasn't from biomed, so I felt it was very difficult to understand prof or fellow presentations
I don't know to say about his letctures, I just could not understand what he was teaching in the classes.
I learned a lot from this course. Specially on trust based recommender systems.  He knows very well what he is teaching and generally encourage students to participate in the class.
